title: Smart Data models - UAV-ADSB schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic UnmannedAerialVehicle (UAV) Automatic Dependent Surveillanceâ€“Broadcast. This entity is primarily associated with the control and management of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles. Each UAVADSB instance will be related to a specific UAV instance.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity identifier. It has to be UnmannedAerialVehicleADSB

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

UnmannedAerialVehicle.description: Relationship. Reference to the Unmanned Aerial Vehicle entity to which this broadcast message relates.

observedAt.description: Property. Indicates the date/time of the DBS broadcast.

originatedByUnmannedAerialVehicle.description: Property. A logical indicator of source of the message. True indicates it is the UAV itself, false indicates that it is a different source, a listening station software application or a different UAV.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

originator.description: Relationship. Refers to a third party UAV instance or other entity (e.g. listening station) that reported the information in the case the message was not directly originated by the UAV.

UnmannedAerialVehicleADSBroadcast.description: Property. A flight message describing the current flight status as a DBSB Message stored as a string of hexadecimal digits.
